preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 10 g of Erbium using a precision scale.  
 2. Weigh out 3 g of Lithium.  
 3. Weigh out 30 g of Silicon.  
 4. Weigh out 40 g of Zinc.  
 5. Combine all ingredients in a clean, dry ceramic mixing container.  
 6. Use a mortar and pestle to grind the mixture until it is a fine, homogeneous powder.
